text.section:
The Commission shall:
maintain a minute or record book; and
record its actions in the minute or record book in usual corporate form.

section.section: The names of the commissioners voting or abstaining shall be included in the minute entry following a brief summary of the matter on which the vote was taken.

text.section: The minute or record book shall be kept available and open to public inspection and copying during business hours in the Commission's principal offices.
